name: Shiver (itch) (Brandon Gilmore)
description:
Shiver has our player searching for 3 dogs in order to stay warm throughout the night. You will traverse 1 of 3 levels to reach the end and complete a puzzle that relates to the music video for "One" by Three Dog Night, so you might want to watch it before playing and pay attention.

Use A&D to move left and right and Space to jump

Co-Written by Michael Phillips

Music: Gyulas Gift (thank you song) by Pro.Tone
Source: https://soundcloud.com/protone68/gyulas-gift-thank-you-song
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
